title: Samsung says Galaxy Watch 4 and future watches will get four years of updates
content:
Yesterday, Samsung officially lifted the curtains off its first 2022 flagship lineup. The newly announced Galaxy S22 series represents the best that Samsung has to offer in the traditional smartphone form factor. All three phones pack amazing hardware, and that, together with Samsung’s new commitment to provide up to four years of Android OS updates,

The post Samsung says Galaxy Watch 4 and future watches will get four years of updates appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung says the Galaxy Watch 4 and Galaxy Watch 4 Classic both will get up to four years of One UI Watch and Wear OS updates.
